data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Felipe N. Soto-Adames (2016): Chaetotaxy of first-instar Campylothorax sabanus (Wray), and description of three new Campylothorax species from Hispaniola (Collembola, Paronellidae). Journal of Natural History 50 (25): 1583-1612, DOI: 10.1080/00222933.2016.1145272
